sn35.154:1.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe… ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn35.154:1.3: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, indriyasampanno hotī”ti?
sn35.154:2.1: “Cakkhundriye ce, bhikkhu, udayabbayānupassī viharanto cakkhundriye nibbindati …pe…
sn35.154:2.2: jivhindriye ce, bhikkhu, udayabbayānupassī viharanto jivhindriye nibbindati …pe…
sn35.154:2.3: manindriye ce, bhikkhu, udayabbayānupassī viharanto manindriye nibbindati.
sn35.154:2.4: Nibbindaṁ virajjati …pe… vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn35.154:2.5: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
